title: Tech Talk. Episodes 19 & 20.
creator_credit: John Kyle, Allenog Pty Ltd and Channel 0\28
brief_description: A compilation tape containing eight programmes designed to help young people in their carrer choices. There is also a segment on survival skills. Presented by Michael Shildberger, the topics covered are as follows:- surveyor, spray painter, painter and decorator, being out of work-the parents angle, computers - working in the industry, computers - the new age, florist and how to keep that job.
